holidays.title: Battle of Las Piedras
holidays.description: On the anniversary of the Battle of Las Piedras, see its enduring mark on Uruguay’s history.

holidays.title: Emergency Medical Services Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the efforts of E.M.S. providers, from E.M.T.s to ambulance drivers.

holidays.title: Haitian Flag Day
holidays.description: Travel back in time with us as we celebrate the historical Haitian Flag Day.

holidays.title: I Love Reese's Day
holidays.description: Stop and have a Reese’s Cup because we are celebrating I Love Reese’s Day.

holidays.title: International AIDS Candlelight Memorial
holidays.description: This memorial gives us a chance to pause and remember those who have died of AIDS.

holidays.title: International Museum Day
holidays.description: It’s an opportunity to support museum education and make everyone aware of the importance of museums.

holidays.title: Mother Whistler Day
holidays.description: Find out how to celebrate Mother Whistler Day right here with us at National Today.

holidays.title: National Brock Day
holidays.description: This National Brock Day, take some time to learn the name’s history and meaning.

holidays.title: National Cheese Soufflé Day
holidays.description: The word ‘soufflé’ comes from the French word ‘souffler,’ which means ‘puff up’ or ‘blow up.’

holidays.title: National HIV Vaccine Awareness Day
holidays.description: Acknowledge AIDS and do your bit to spread the word.

holidays.title: National Marvin Day
holidays.description: Know someone named Marvin? Make their day by celebrating their name right here, right now.

holidays.title: National Visit Your Relatives Day
holidays.description: A day dedicated to spending time with your loved ones and cherishing family time.

holidays.title: Rural Life Sunday
holidays.description: This Sunday, you’ll be enjoying a day filled with celebrations, worship, and remembrance.

holidays.title: Send an Electronic Greeting Card Day
holidays.description: Sending a customized e-card is a delightful and simple method to express kindness to others.

holidays.title: State Flag of Turkmenistan Day
holidays.description: Appreciate the beauty and symbolism of the Turkmen flag and keep it flying high.

holidays.title: Stepmother's Day
holidays.description: Stepmother’s Day takes place to appreciate all the stepmothers around the world.

holidays.title: Take Your Parents To The Playground Day
holidays.description: A day dedicated to playing outdoors — for parents.

holidays.title: World AIDS Vaccine Day
holidays.description: An annual event to raise awareness about H.I.V. infection and AIDS and their prevention.

holidays.title: World Baking Day
holidays.description: Whether it be a biscuit, bagel, or muffin, World Baking Day is for you to make them from scratch.

holidays.title: Ava Pearl’s Birthday
holidays.description: She’s a Jack-of-All-Trades: she is an established musician and a well-known vlogger.

holidays.title: George Strait’s Birthday
holidays.description: The story of George Strait is moving, just like his very popular music.

holidays.title: Mister Cartoon’s Birthday
holidays.description: Mister Cartoon's incredible art made its way from the streets to the big screen.

holidays.title: Teresa Giudice’s Birthday
holidays.description: Teresa Giudice’s story proves that success is not final and failure is not fatal.

holidays.title: Tina Fey’s Birthday
holidays.description: She can write, act, and produce and the world can never get enough.
